title: HopeBank Agency (UI)
description: Built a responsive, accessible React UI for HopeBank’s agency portal, crafting pixel‑perfect layouts for account overviews, transaction lookups, and deposit forms.

title: Umamy city.com
description: Built a responsive food‑ordering UI with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring dynamic menu filtering, cart management, and LocalStorage‑powered order persistence.

title: My Portfolio
description: Developed a personal portfolio website to showcase my projects, skills, and background. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it features a responsive layout, smooth scrolling navigation, an interactive project gallery, and a contact form for inquiries.

title: Website Summarizer
description: A dynamic web application to summarize uploaded articles using OpenAI GPT-4 API.

title: Recipe Finder
description: A dynamic web application that helps users discover new recipes based on ingredients, dietary preferences, and nutritional requirements. Leveraging the powerful Edamam API, this tool offers a vast database of recipes from around the world.

title: ProCompress
description: ProCompress is a cutting-edge image compression tool designed to optimize image sizes, enhance website performance, and reduce bandwidth usage. This innovative web application leverages the latest compression algorithms and user-friendly interfaces to deliver fast, efficient image optimization solutions.

title: Biometric Attendance System
description: Replaced NFC cards with a Bluetooth‑connected fingerprint scanner for secure student enrollment and attendance tracking.
Enrolled students via fingerprint, created courses, and recorded attendance per course, with real‑time updates through WebSockets.
Stored and retrieved attendance records in Firebase, using Firebase Auth for secure admin access.
hardwareIntegration: Fingerprint scanner connected over Bluetooth and interfaced via a Node.js script using WebSockets for live operations.

title: Course Registation System (Admin)
description: A full‑stack React & Firebase application that automates student course enrollment. Features secure authentication, course selection via Enrollment API or CSV upload (PapaParse), and downloadable PDF reports (jsPDF), all wrapped in a polished Ant Design & Framer Motion interface. Automates tedious manual processes to deliver faster, more accurate outcomes.

title: Course Registration System (Student)
description: When an admin enrolls a student, an account is auto‑created using their email and matric number with a default password (changeable on first login). Students log in to access their profile page and view all registered courses in a clean, intuitive React & Firebase portal built with Ant Design and Framer Motion.

title: Hospital Management System
description: React & Firebase HMS for patient record management, portal‑email appointment scheduling, treatment & prescription tracking, billing, and patient self‑registration.

title: Vehicle Verification System
description: A React & Firebase system that verifies license plates using OCR and Tesseract in Python. Admins can manage users and assign roles like officer or vehicle owner.   NOTE: The portal handles 3 roles i.e. Admin, Officer, And Vehicle Owners.

title: Mood Tracker Application V1
description: The Mood Tracker is a web application designed to help users log and visualize their daily moods. Users can select from a set of predefined mood emojis or add custom emojis to represent their feelings. The application allows users to add notes to their mood entries, view a history of their moods, and visualize mood trends over time using a chart. Additionally, users can export their mood data as a JSON file for personal records. The application supports both light and dark themes for a personalized user experience.

title: NFC Tracking System
description: A React & Firebase-based attendance system integrated with NFC hardware for real-time tracking across classrooms, exams, and campus access. It supports multi-level enrollment, time-stamped logs, and generates comprehensive attendance reports. Hardware communication is handled via Node.js and WebSockets.

title: Mood Tracker Application V2
description: An advanced mood tracking web application that helps users monitor their emotional well-being with AI-powered insights. The app features a clean, responsive interface for logging daily moods using emojis, along with journal entries and tags. Key features include personalized AI emotional support, detailed mood analytics showing patterns and trends, tag-based mood correlation insights, and an interactive chart displaying mood history. The application prioritizes user privacy by storing all data locally, while offering a sophisticated dark/light theme system and mobile-first design.

title: Valarlucir Merch Store
description: An e-commerce merch site built with Vite and TypeScript. It features category navigation, product galleries, cart management, and Stripe-powered checkout—all wrapped in a polished UI using Headless UI, Radix Dialogs/Toasts, Heroicons, and smooth Framer Motion transitions.

title: GoCart Store
description: GoCart is an AI-enhanced e-commerce storefront built with Next.js and Turbopack. It pairs a Neon serverless database with Prisma for reliable data modeling, Clerk for authentication, and Inngest to run background AI tasks (recommendations, async processing, and other background workflows). The product UI is built with React and Tailwind CSS and includes dynamic product catalogs, personalized AI-driven suggestions, secure checkout flows, and automated background processing.
